name: Magical Skater Rush
description:
Play as a magical girl who flies on her magic broom and draws magic symbols to clear obstacles in her path.

Draw the symbols indicated above the obstacles using your mouse to make them disappear.

This game was made during the video games lab Game jam 2021 in 60 hours by a team of 7 people:

Game Designer: Rodolphe LANG
Game Artists: Salomé LYSIMAQUE-CHAPUIS & Solyna GONZALEZ
Gameplay Programmers: Victor CAVAGNAC, Mathis LENORMAND & Jérémie POCHAT DE BERNARDO

Additional assets & Resources used:

  • Sound and music by xorus.audio
